column4: What process do Ubuntu devs use to produce the original CD images? There has to be scripts/tools that determine everything that needs to be on the CD, given a set of packagesm, right? I want to make a cd with just the essentials + custom selection of other packages.
I will take a look. my understanding of that tool was that it was just for updating one CD image to another, but I might've overlooked quite a bit.
i have no idea what it does, but in the end i have an .iso in my directory.  something tells me it builds it.
